SummaryEnglish: Kinnikuman returns to the ring in an epic three-way battle between the Justice, Devil and Perfect Chojin factions, and reveals the roots of the Choujin.
Aliases: キン肉マン (新シリーズ)
キン肉マン (新アニメシリーズ)

1.SummaryEnglish: Ahead of his wedding, Kinnikuman returns to Earth to spar with Terryman. While there, he reunites with his friends and reminisces about past fights.

2.TitleEnglish: 完璧・無量大数軍との闘い！その軌跡!!

1.TitleEnglish: A New Chapter of History Begins!
1.SummaryEnglish: The Seigi, Akuma and Perfect Chojin factions form a non-aggression pact. Later, a hostile group gatecrashes a Seigi Chojin fan appreciation event.

2.SummaryEnglish: Terryman declares that he will represent the Seigi Chojin and battle the Perfect Large Numbers Corps. His first opponent is the merciless Max Radial.

3.SummaryEnglish: As the wounded Terryman struggles against Max Radial and his troublesome tires, he notices something that can help him turn the fight around.

4.SummaryEnglish: Five Akuma Chojin appear and battle the Perfect Large Numbers in the rings around the world. Turbomen contends with Stecasse-King's powers of mimicry.

5.SummaryEnglish: Just as Stecasse-King seems poised for victory, Turbomen turns the tables with a cunning trap. Mr. Khamen tenaciously tussles with Crushman in Berlin.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Akuma Chojin reveal their true intentions. In the wrestling ring floating on the River Thames in London, Atlantis fights the fishlike Marlinman.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Akuma Chojin reveal their true intentions. In the wrestling ring floating on the River Thames in London, Atlantis fights the fishlike Marlinman.

8.TitleEnglish: With the First and Final Signature Move!
8.SummaryEnglish: As the crowd silently looks on at Atlantis impaled on Marlinman’s bill, a lone cheer of encouragement spurs Atlantis into pulling off a miracle.

9.SummaryEnglish: As the fast-learning Peek a Boo continues using Kinnikuman's powerful skills against him, Kinnikuman decides to rely on basic fighting techniques.

10.SummaryEnglish: While watching The Mountain struggle against Strong the Budo, Buffaloman recalls meeting with his fellow Akuma Chojin before the matches began.

11.SummaryEnglish: Led by an unfamiliar Kinniku Clan member, the second group of Perfect Large Numbers arrives to face Kinnikuman and his friends in the next stage.

1.TitleEnglish: A Three-way Showdown! The Deadly Battle Begins at the Pyramid Staircase!!
1.SummaryEnglish: The wrestlers hurry to the step pyramid rings, where seven members from the Seigi and Akuma Chojin factions team up to face the Perfect Large Numbers.

2.SummaryEnglish: Brocken Jr. finds himself at a disadvantage in his match against Crushman. Just when things seem hopeless, Ramenman shouts words of encouragement.

3.TitleEnglish: Belief of the Noble Kung Fu Expert!
3.SummaryEnglish: As Marvelous seems confidently poised to strike a killing blow, a repentant Ramenman explains to him the virtue of sparing an opponent's life.

4.SummaryEnglish: Unable to use his shadowy skills due to Jack Chi's watery blasts, Black Hole finds himself on the verge of defeat — until he hears a familiar voice.

5.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Devil Tag Team Returns!!
5.SummaryEnglish: After the Chojin Chairman approves a sudden change of format, Springman and Buffaloman take on Turbomen and Grim Reaper in a tag-team match.

6.TitleEnglish: Did you see that, comrades? A life-threatening revenge!!
6.SummaryEnglish: Spring Man's strongest special move, Devil Tomboy, explodes on Turbo Man! In a bid to avenge Stekase King, Spring Man tightens his grip with the force of his technique, nearly tearing his entire body apart.

7.SummaryEnglish: Buffaloman faces a difficult choice. Despite Robin Mask’s impressive performance in the ring, Nemesis arrogantly dismisses him as an inferior Chojin.

8.SummaryEnglish: Withstanding Nemesis' devastating attacks, Robin Mask reveals how his past losses to Kinnikuman affected his sense of pride as a Seigi Chojin.

9.TitleEnglish: Keeping my teacher's teachings in mind!!
9.SummaryEnglish: The battle between Robin Mask and Nemesis is reaching its final stage. Who will be victorious?! The final, yet to be decided, match between Warsman and Polarman on the top floor of the Step Pyramid Ring is finally getting intense!

10.SummaryEnglish: Warsman has a hard time finding an effective solution to Polarman's transcendent power play that transcends dimensions.

11.SummaryEnglish: Warsman's doubts disappeared after he remembered the important words he received from his parents and his respected master Robin Mask. The biggest difference between flesh and machine is knowing the value of life.
